level.heading: GAME INSTRUCTIONS (ยง 30-701) 701 Before the commencement of a particular instant game, or any lottery game, or variation of a game, the Executive Director shall issue game instructions to agents and the public governing and implementing its operation. The instructions shall include the price of the ticket.

level.text: Game instructions shall be made available to the public at agent locations and the Agency’s principal offices.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemakings at 29 DCR 2202, 2212 (May 28, 1982).
